1 Samuel or 1 Kings__08.1: And it came to pass when Samuel was old, that he appointed his sons to be judges over Israel.
1 Samuel or 1 Kings__08.2: Now the name of his firstborn son was Joel: and the name of the second was Abia, judges in Bersabee.
1 Samuel or 1 Kings__08.3: And his sons walked not in his ways: but they turned aside after lucre, and took bribes, and perverted judgment.
1 Samuel or 1 Kings__08.4: Then all the ancients of Israel being assembled, came to Samuel to Ramatha.
1 Samuel or 1 Kings__08.5: And they said to him: Behold thou art old, and thy sons walk not in thy ways: make us a king, to judge us, as all nations have.
1 Samuel or 1 Kings__08.6: And the word was displeasing in the eyes of Samuel, that they should say: Give us a king, to judge us. And Samuel prayed to the Lord.
1 Samuel or 1 Kings__08.7: And the Lord said to Samuel: Hearken to the voice of the people in all that they say to thee. For they have not <u>rejected</u> thee, but me, that I should not reign over them.
1 Samuel or 1 Kings__08.8: According to all their works, they have done from the day that I brought them out of Egypt until this day: as they have forsaken me, and served strange gods, so do they also unto thee.
1 Samuel or 1 Kings__08.9: Now therefore hearken to their voice: but yet testify to them, and foretell them <u>the right</u> of the king, that shall reign over them.
1 Samuel or 1 Kings__08.10: Then Samuel told all the words of the Lord to the people that had desired a king of him,
1 Samuel or 1 Kings__08.11: And said: This will be the right of the king, that shall reign over you: He will take your sons, and put them in his chariots, and will make them his horsemen, and his running footmen to run before his chariots,
1 Samuel or 1 Kings__08.12: And he will appoint of them to be his tribunes, and centurions, and to plough his fields, and to reap his corn, and to make him arms and chariots.
1 Samuel or 1 Kings__08.13: Your daughters also he will take to make him ointments, and to be his cooks, and bakers.
1 Samuel or 1 Kings__08.14: And he will take your fields, and your vineyards, and your best oliveyards, and give them to his servants.
1 Samuel or 1 Kings__08.15: Moreover he will take the tenth of your corn, and of the revenues of your vineyards, to give his eunuchs and servants.
1 Samuel or 1 Kings__08.16: Your servants also and handmaids, and your goodliest young men, and your asses he will take away, and put them to his work.
1 Samuel or 1 Kings__08.17: Your flocks also he will tithe, and you shall be his servants.
1 Samuel or 1 Kings__08.18: And you shall cry out in that day from the face of the king, whom you have chosen to yourselves. and the Lord will not hear you in that day, because you desired unto yourselves a king.
1 Samuel or 1 Kings__08.19: But the people would not hear the voice of Samuel, and they said: Nay: but there shall be a king over us.
1 Samuel or 1 Kings__08.20: And we also will be like all nations: and our king shall judge us, and go out before us, and fight our battles for us.
1 Samuel or 1 Kings__08.21: And Samuel heard all the words of the people, and rehearsed them in the ears of the Lord.
1 Samuel or 1 Kings__08.22: And the Lord said to Samuel: Hearken to their voice, and make them a king. And Samuel said to the men of Israel: Let every man go to his city.
